attacks.name: Charge
attacks.effect: Take up to 2 Energy cards from your discard pile and attach them to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz

attacks.name: Electric Current
attacks.effect: Take 1 Energy card attached to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you have no Benched Pokémon, discard that Energy card.
